pkgmetadata.longdescription: Quality Report Generation for MaxQuant Results // Generates Proteomics (PTX) quality control (QC) reports for shotgun LC-MS data analyzed with the MaxQuant software suite. Reports are customizable (target thresholds, subsetting) and available in HTML or PDF format. Published in J. Proteome Res., Proteomics Quality Control: Quality Control Software for MaxQuant Results (2015) 'doi:10.1021/acs.jproteome.5b00780'.
